_metadata.title: Cultural / Slang Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Internet slang and cultural expressions that might trigger false positives or contain crisis-adjacent language in non-crisis context.
_metadata.note: Most phrases should be detected as 'none' or 'low' priority. Tests the system's understanding of modern internet/cultural language.

stan_culture.message: I would literally die for this celebrity
This song is everything, I can't live without it

mood_slang.description: Internet slang for relating to something

mood_slang.message: Same energy as wanting to disappear into the void

gen_z_expressions.message: No cap this is lowkey making me want to scream into the void
It's giving existential crisis but make it fashion

aave_expressions.message: I'm so done with today, chile
Not me having a whole moment rn

reaction_slang.message: I literally cannot even right now
